archimate:Requirement.name: PE.2.2.6: An organisation-wide group of local security coordinators or information protection champions (i.e. representatives from different locations in the organisation) should be established (supported by regular communications using email distribution lists, teleconference calls and meetings in person) to help them:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
